title.rendered: Handling Phone Interviews : Are You Phone Savvy?

content.rendered:
Phone interviews are more popular than you’d think and may arise at times when you’re unprepared.  In this quick video, Cory gives some great pointers on what to do and what NOT to do.  These are valuable tips and lessons learned for you to reference for future phone interviews.

<iframe loading="lazy" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/ZgxP6VP-BjQ" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
